title: Figure, "Man with Pick Axe", 1960–70
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man wearing red cap with star, brown jacket with red badge, striding forward with right leg, holding pick axe over left shoulder.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Man with Pick Axe", 1960–70.
1960–70. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-242.
